drums.name: Snare drum
drums.description: This is one of the most versatile and essential percussion instruments. it provides the backbeat, typically played on 2 and 4 in various genres.

drums.name: Cymbals
drums.description: They are used for dramatic accents and crescendos, they normally indicate closure of a loop. There are various types which include rides, splashes, crushes...

drums.name: Drum Sticks
drums.description: They are used to strike drums and cymbals to produce sound. They come in various shapes, sizes, and materials, each affecting the tone and feel of the drumming experience.
